page.title: 03Middleton.A Personal View.
page.content: Class 2MW looked at half of our given area(the primary took the other half)The area is classed as an educational priority area with an attendant number of social problems.Unemployment is {very high and at a glance much of the area seems to be run down.Vandalism is rife. Few social amenities exist except for a number of public houses and a lovely park.(all looked at by the primary school).My children are all in school uniform and are very clean,even though some of their parents are out of work or earn a tiny wage.To an "outsider"the area seems depressing,but my class have a wealth of talent and a great love for their area.One thing that is very clear---times in Middleton are hard..
